title: The Bell II
marks: Signature, Date and Mark at top, in engraving: [R.S.A. / 1927]
description: on beige/grey paper; image of a large bell surrounded by wooden deck with railing; suspended from strap over wooden board; arched wooden form above; bell is adorned with a band of Latin text near bottom with a cross (copy of L2013.108.23)
creditline: Gift of Robert Austin's daughters, Rachel and Clare
